summary:
Home - The father of the two icons, Doge and Neiro 🧡

 Create a Wallet - Download MetaMask (or your preferred wallet) from the app store, Google Play, or as a Chrome extension from metamask.io.

 Go to Uniswap - Visit app.uniswap.org on Chrome or MetaMask’s browser. Connect your wallet, paste the $HEYOSAMU token address, select HEYOSAMU, and confirm.

 This page provides information about $osamu - This page provides information about $osamu for community members and interested individuals. $osamu is a meme coin without any inherent value or the promise of financial gain. It lacks a formal team or roadmap. The coin is purely for entertainment and serves no practical purpose.
